explanation: [0-0] A person holds a Spider-Man action figure in their left hand and an Iron Man Funko Pop figure in their right hand. The Iron Man figure is standing on a blue stand.

[0-3] The Spider-Man and Iron Man figures are then collided together, transforming into a brand-new figure combining Iron Man and Spider-Man elements. Next, a yellow action figure holding a blue weapon in an attack posture, and the Iron Man figure on the blue stand are brought together and collided, transforming into a brand-new blue figure.
